Home.title: Zen Texts Translation Comparison

explore.title: Explore Translations
explore.desc: Browse through different translations of classic Zen texts.

compare.title: Compare Translations
compare.desc: Compare different translations side by side.

about.title: About This Project
about.desc: This application allows you to explore and compare different translations of classic Zen texts. You can browse through books, read verses, and compare how different translators have interpreted the same text.
